summary:
“Captain Marvel” hopes to make a lasting connection with fans in new TV spot

Captain Marvel aims to harder, faster and...
caption:
“Captain Marvel” hopes to make a lasting connection with fans in new TV spot

Captain Marvel aims to harder, faster and stronger, with a new TV spot. But the high road is not the only path she’s willing to take, as she seems at home for the tit-for-tat, screaming matches we all got into as kids. Watch the Captain Marvel “Connection” TV spot in the player below:

I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle, but if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." Disney, Marvel, Harry Potter, Star Wars. Other stuff. Mainly that stuff though.

summary: A Marvel Kapitány hivatalos weboldala a ’90-es évek hangulatát idézi
title: A Marvel Kapitány hivatalos weboldala a ’90-es évek hangulatát idézi
body:
‘90-es éveket idézi a Marvel Kapitány hivatalos weboldala. Nektek hogy tetszik? #Marvel #MarvelKapitány #BrieLarson

Retro köntösben, a ’90-es évek hangulatában mutatták be a Marvel Kapitány hivatalos weboldalát.

A Marvel Kapitánystílusában jobban megfelel napjainknak, a film megvalósítása is a legmodernebb technológiákkal készült, de a weboldala határozottan a régi időkbe kalauzolja vissza az arra látogatókat. A film bemutatója nincs már messze, március 7-án bemutatkozik a Marvel Moziverzum legerősebb…

View On WordPress

title: Goose'nin Captain Marvel'daki Gerçek Kimliği Ortaya Çıktı! (Spoiler) - popgek
excerpt: Captain Marvel'ın vizyona girmesine 1 aydan az süre kaldığı şu günlerde, filmin oyuncakları da raflarda yerlerini almaya başladı. Her zaman olduğu gibi oyuncaklar yine bize filmle ilgili ipuçları veriyor gibi duruyor.

summary: I. AM. SICK. OF PEOPLE HATING ON CAPTAIN MARVEL  and I’ve seen worst but couldn't find them, this went from ‘’why won’t she...
body:
I. AM. SICK. OF PEOPLE HATING ON CAPTAIN MARVEL 

and I’ve seen worst but couldn’t find them, this went from ‘’why won’t she smile’’ to ‘’they could’ve picked a better actress’’ then ‘’I don't want her to be the one who kills Thanos’’ and ‘’the only reason I'm seeing this movie is because of Nick Fury’’ and even when we show and tell these people how Iron Man, Cap, or even WW didn’t smile in their trailers or posters either, they find new excuses on hating Brie or the character or the movie.
But I’ve noticed something, apart from the fact that 90% of these negative comments are from MEN, the majority also is people who wanted Black Panther to be a failure, racist misogynist people, ugh they sicken me. And it’s even sadder to see WOMEN trashing on this movie like WHAT THE ACTUAL F, I mean, shouldn’t we be happy because we are being represented in a non-sexual way?! in a non-secondary character way?, non-damsel in distress, non-villain way, honestly, WHY? I don’t remember Wonder Woman receiving this much hate, maybe yes, the trailers aren’t made to get all people exited, yes perhaps there was an actress who would fill the expectations of more people, yes I understand people aren’t interested in the movie because the character isn’t that well-known, but this movie is kinda like Doctor Strange and Antman because there’s not that much hype, not that many people interested besides actual fans, not that much excitement from non-fans, and probably it’ll make between 600k and 850k M of dollars in the box-office, like AMaTW and DS but even those movies didn’t receive this much hate. Yes I’m also aware that certain things Brie Larson has said and made are reasons for people to hate even more on this movie, but UuHgH I don’t want to argue with anyone I just wanted to express my anger, It’s ok if you find trailers boring and it’s ok if you don’t want to watch it, it’s ok if you feel Marvel is being too feminist and I get that you think feminism is ruining mainstream, yes I get it, you don’t care abt this movie you hate the actress you hate she’s THAT powerful you hate and are afraid she’s gonna kill Thanos, YES I GET IT YOU WOULD PREFER A MOVIE ABOUT ADAM WARLOCK so if you feel all of that then DON’T WATCH THE MOVIE and leave US, PEOPLE AND FANS WHO ACTUALLY WANT TO SEE THE MOVIE ENJOY IT AND IT’S PROMO WITHOUT HAVING TO READ YOUR STUPID COMMENTS ON HOW SHE DOESN’T SMILE AND HOW SHE SHOULDNT BE THAT POWERFUL honestly stop because your misogyny is showing
